body:
Are you looking for **Biden VP Odds**? 

You know that Kamala Harris is the raging favorite from an all female cast of possible **Democratic Vice Presidential Candidates**. But how likely is Harris?

Her odds are fluctuating every day. From between 30-60% in the last few weeks. 

She's a strong favorite but she's not home yet.

What are Harris' odds at this point in time, and who are her closest challengers?

- - -

## **2020 Biden VP Odds**

<canvas id='g11' name="brgraph" data-file-name="DemocraticVPOdds.json" data-only-names="Kamala Harris,Susan Rice,Karen Bass,Val Demings,Tammy Duckworth,Elizabeth Warren" data-start="2020-03-01 00:00" width="400" height="150"></canvas>

As you can see, Harris is the clear front runner. 

Many sports bettors and political pundits have been forecasting Harris for a long time and they've seen her appointment as a formality. But the betting data isn't convinced despite **[Politico](https://www.politico.com/news/2020/07/27/joe-biden-vp-running-mate-pick-tracker-377652)** and other sources saying it's over.

![Biden VP Odds (Democratic Vice Presidential Candidates)?](/images/uploads/biden-vp-odds-kamala-harris.jpg "Looking for Biden VP Odds (Democratic Vice Presidential Candidates)?")

Her biggest threats are where it gets interesting. 

**Susan Rice** is the big improver in the last few weeks, clearly moving into second position. 

And then **Karen Bass** skyrocketed into contention, before dropping off a cliff.

There's been speculative support behind **Tammy Duckworth** but she's back along side **Elizabeth Warren** now.

Meanwhile, **Val Demings** was Kamala Harris' biggest challenger six weeks ago but she's now an unlikely selection.

- - -

## **Our Biden VP Prediction?**

Leveraging the extreme intelligence of **[Tavis Rendell](https://twitter.com/tavisrendell)**, we like two options.

You have to respect Kamala Harris in the betting market. She has the resume and profile to get the job done. She ticks a lot of boxes.

However, we haven't forgotten about **[Tulsi Gabbard verbally KO'ing](https://edition.cnn.com/videos/politics/2019/08/01/tulsi-gabbard-kamala-harris-prosecutions-record-cnn-democratic-debate-vpx.cnn)** Harris.

Maybe it's just us (and Gabbard) but doesn't Harris reek of smugness?

We actually think she'll get rolled. 

So we're going with Rendell's value pick.

**Tammy Duckworth**. 

The double amputee who served in Iraq as a Lieutenant Colonel is a very tough woman for Trump to attack.

Duckworth was 5% when we recommended her last week but she's improved to a 10% chance.

- - -

## **Where Do We Get Accurate Biden VP Odds?**

We pull data from Betfair where over $3,000,000 USD has been traded. 

We rely exclusively relies on **[The Wisdom Of Crowds](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/The_Wisdom_of_Crowds)**. Which means everyone's opinion is given weight.

You will not find a more accurate data source for Biden VP Odds.

Keep coming back to our site as Joe gets closer to a decision.

- - -

## **2020 US Election Odds**

If you're enjoying our Biden VP Odds graph, make sure you check out the **[Election Odds](https://www.betrefinery.com/us-election-betting/election-betting-odds)**.

You'll notice that Donald Trump is well behind Joe Biden as the most likely winner of the November Election.
title: Biden VP Odds: Will Kamala Harris Get Rolled?
seoTitle: Looking for Biden VP Odds? Democratic Vice Presidential Candidates Confirmed
description: Are you looking for Biden VP Odds? In a strong female field of Democratic Vice Presidential Candidates, lets find out who Joe Biden will be choosing as his running mate.
